title: Does anyone else really miss Hide and Seek?
body: This fan-made mode was the sole reason why I played League of Legends for a whole year. It was the best thing in the world and I had the most fun games ever while playing it. I really wish Riot would bring it back and allow the players to have fun with custom game mods. They don't even need to keep updating it item-wise. It was extremely fun and completely harmless.

When Dominion was still here, we used to make custom lobbies (yes in the "Custom" tab there was a lot of lobbies) for Hide and Seek only. There were 2 seekers and 5 hiders. It was amazing

It was a goddamned Spiritual experience. The hiders could only use CC abilities, there were rules, there were prebanned champions and you had 5 lives. The occasional jack-ass trolls aside, it was the best thing to ever happen to this game.
Can we just bring back dominion

I think most of the player base wants dominion in place or in addition to blitz or at least to have it added back into custom game modes which would be really nice. I also really miss hide and seek as I played only that for a few months back then

H&S was a custom game mode on the Crystal Scar aka the map ascension and dominion are played on.

There were 2 teams, 1, 5 hiders the other 2 seekers.

The seekers had to kill all 5 hiders within 40 min or they lost.
I loved H/S so much! It was honestly amazing training for kiting and for running away. I played Bard almost exclusively and I started dying a lot less in my games as a result.

Getting LeBlanc in Hide and Seek was an early Christmas for me. It taught me to troll so exceptionally I would literally win normal games by forcing the entire enemy team to chase me around while my teammates split-pushed. Golden times.

Oh, the memories are making me tear up. I would troll the shit out of Seekers to the point where they would just ignore me after some time. Up until my entire team was out and both of them chased me like hounds on a scent lol
